name: Change of Pace
description:
Change of Pace is a Walking Simulator / Racing Game made by River Giant Games for Ludum Dare 41, under the theme "Combine 2 Incompatible Genres".

In the game, you play as Johnny Walker, the latest recruit in the Qualicum Walking Club. Born a natural competitor, you feel compelled to demonstrate your abilities as the fastest walker around. Try out your walking abilities against the clubs three members, each with their own personalities and walking tactics!

Head Programmer: Dylan Powell

Art / Music: Hudson Thorpe-Doubble
